reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight has an amazing premise.  Built on a concept that deals with 1970-90 slasher horror, DbD pits 4 late teen/20-something survivors against one of four classic killer archtypes (chainsaw hillbilly, the facemasked trapper, the invisible voodooesque wraith or the phantasmal nurse).  I observed the game for over 2 years, waiting eagerly for its release.  I was rewarded with an inexpensive, creative, well-conceptualized title that is broken beyond repair.  The game is ultimately too flawed to enjoy in its current state.

Borne by BeHavior, a fast food pack-in video game development house, DbD represents one of their first attempts at a AAA title and the first real attempt at their very own IP.  The game is built by a small team atop the new Unreal 4 engine, which they butcher at every corner.  The game's premise revolves around a team of surivors that work together to start several generators in a map that allow automatic doors to be engaged.  Once the automatic doors are engaged, the survivors escape, score experience points, which they can promptly use to level and improve their specific character.  Killers must hunt and stop them by either incapacitating them or hanging them from a hook, thereby feeding their essences to a dark, hungering entity that impels the muderer towards his/her unending task.

The concept is neat and the fact that the game utilizes a first person camera view for the killer, while framing survivors in a third person view, is an important distinction that adds depth to the title.  Killers are focused and unceasing and use their hearing, as well as sight to locate their prey.  Survivors by contrast can better manipulate their bodies and possess a better awareness of their surroundings.  However, their primary mode of detection (apart from a heartbeat) is sight.  The concept of starting generators is an interesting one, albeit simplistic and that's where the issues with DbD first begin.

The game would be infinitely better if survivors could repair a solitary car in one map, or build a boat in another.  Perhaps the survivors could call the police or set up a trap for the killer.  Adding various objectives rather than the same, tired, rote "generator hustle" would have added a massive dose of life to this game.  As it stands, this game is a generator minigame with a killer mechanic tacked on.  As survivors are captured by the killer and impaled on hooks, as offerings to their dark god, the murderer-player will often camp the captured survivor, making it very difficult for that individual to escape.  This makes it possible for some gamers to be out of the game very quickly (I was never very good at it and this happened to me often).  Unable to finish the level, I often failed to obtain rewards that stunted my progression.  

Other players didn't have the same issues and were soon able to rack up 3-4 perks that could drastically improve their survival abilities, further aggravating the issue.  I don't recommend that players that use other gammas other than default Windows play this game. As a part-time graphic designer that runs Mac/Photoshop gammas...the game is unforgivingly dark and that compounds an inability to see the killer.  However, despite my bad performance in the game, I would have stuck around if I felt that the game had compelling gameplay to offer.

That, however, is not the case.  Not only is the game lacking various objectives, as I mentioned earlier, but every map looks fairly similar.  Despite having various locations like a car yard or a farm or an asylum, etc...the maps are really just identical game sandboxes populated "dynamically" by rocks, trees and the occasional unique buildings/structures.  If you're jonesing for a romp INSIDE an asylum, look elsewhere.  If you think that a burnt car yard should have more atmosphere than a few crushed vehicles scattered throughout an identical forest environment, you WILL be disappointed.

The samey feel of all the maps augments the lack of objective variety and when compounded by the game's complete dearth of community, and singleplayer, can make DbD a bit of a slog after a few hours.  With no method to communicate in game, teams of survivors often have no reason to work together other than "fixing" a generator together.  The creation of a community is non-existent as players hardly make new friends when they can't even type into a chat box within the game, much less communicate via VOIP.

Many players suggested a "whisper" system that would allow the killer to hear players collaborating if he/she is close enough.  That would be an excellent balance system as it would encourage cooperation, promote community and would serve as a foil for survivors that are not careful when a killer is near.  Alas, the game is absolutely silent.  The game also lacks a singleplayer mode where weaker players can practice their skills without getting dominated over and over, as matchmaking is very poor.

And matchmaking itself is extremely poor.  Games are an augean feat to secure. And I've waited over 45 minutes on three seperate occasions to find a game.  On two of such occasions, I gave up when a game couldn't be secured.  On the third occasion, I was promptly spawned in front of the killer and was killed, having waited 45 minutes for literally 4 minutes of gameplay.  The game is a running joke about "finding servers" only to end up back at the Ready phase. Players that have dedicated time to this game have repeated stated this in other Steam reviews.  Listen carefully to that refrain.

Playing with friends was a feature that shipped almost 3 months after the game released and, to this day, works rather poorly.  In fact if you want to host a match against your friends and you wish to play as the killer, the game confers no experience.  Therefore, if you want to play DbD and feel that you're a better killer player, you simply have to go game with strangers if you wish to advance your character progression.  This is a draconian and ill-conceived mistake, especially in light of the already prominent hacking occurring within the game.  With no real, professional-grade anti-hacking/cheat mechanism in place, I've personally run into killers that can see through walls and that kill with one hit, right at the outset of a game.

Yes, such hacks aren't common and are extremely rare but they do exist and are a far greater threat to player enjoyment than some friends progressing together in a private match.  With no real story to speak of and minimal character customizability, players really only have the adrenaline surge of dodging a killer as the sole element to keep them returning.  Unfortunately, the game's population has already begun to decline and as other games like Friday the 13th and Last Year release this year, the game will be faced with extremely staunch competition.

While Unreal 4 engine games scale successfully all the way down to iOS devices, and despite the fact that DbD's visuals are wholly lacking, the game fails to run properly on a variety of systems.  Sure, I still got over 80 fps on maximum settings but for a game that is uglier than Left 4 Dead 2, a 7 year predecessor, DbD should run far, far better than that.  Textures are muddled and look like they were photographs that were run under a daubs/paintbrush filter in Photoshop.  Models range from reasonably good looking (Dwight) all the way to absurdly ill-conceived (Wraith- 10 poly chicken legs, go!).  Animation errors abound, and survivors will often be stuck floating in air, as if cinched by their belt, or unable to crouch, or cursed to be perma-prone.  Many killer swipes fail to connect or connect through solid walls.  Many survivors have been caught by a killer, unfairly, as they completed a vaulting animation out of a window, only to catapult back into the murderer's grasp.  The game crashes and will sometimes glitch and become stuck within a menu or within the game itself. 

7/10.
偷我的电可以，拿我的土特产不行。

This game is not supported on multi-moniter displays and cannot be fixed.  The forums do not have a solution for it and with the gaming world quickly expanding out of single moniter displays, this NEEDS to be updated.  I have found that the devs do minimal work on this game and this will probably be a permenant issue.

A very fun and thrilling game, but when you start up, either as survivor or killer it would feel like you are just losing all the time and wonder how do people manage to rank up, this is because you gain perks as you level up (which makes things easier) and also because the game mechanics and strategies take a while to be adquired.

Bugs are there but the devs have been really listening to the community comments and constantly fixing game issues and balancing the game more as each updates goes.

If you focus more on having fun, have a thrilling experience and a good time with friends this is definetly a game for it, and if you are competitive... get ready to get "hooked" on it for a while (hehehe... no seriously the game is hard as nails competitively if you want to rank up)

I recommend to try both roles, dedicating time to both is very useful and helps you understand both the mechanics and other players.

Dedicated servers incoming.

I think they should add an indoor map with long halls and small rooms. And instead of generators you have power switches and instead of hooks you are strapped down to a table with the Entity slowly coming down on you.
Bug-ridden and unbalanced piece of shit.

The game is simple in nature, but very difficult to play and master. Your heart will race and you will hold your breath in this game.

I have played as a survivor and a killer and both are as equally challenging. There are some players as the killer that have a great sense of where the survivors are; either they are cheating or we can hope they are seeing a psychologist for these tendencies. 

I am hoping for three things from the devs; 1) the matchmaking while queueing with your friends is chunky and clunky, 2) hide the killer's name from the survivors after the match, I am learning the game and trying to be a good killer and one game had a complete hater that cried about me camping (even though I was searching around him while he was on the hook for a trap and anyone trying to rescue him -- escuse me for trying to kill you...oh yea, I did - here's a tissue) and then he continually invited me to a face-camping steam group until I reported him for spamming me, 3) MORE KILLERS and MAPS!!

Overall fun, however it needs a report feature.  Getting killers who's internet is atrocious and causes everyone to rubberband takes the fun out of it.  Either move the games to dedicated servers or they will start to lose people en masse.

Well 100 hours in and I still can't recommend this game. You crash wayyyyyy too often. You set a trap, you crash, you hook someone, you crash, you pick up someone you crash. It's just crash report after crash report with nothing getting fixed. The only time it doesnt crash is when youre playing survivor and you just cant win survivor, at least not as easily as a killer. You'll constantly be matched with rank 1 killers and just get creamed. The game runs like shit even on good cards and the devs dont seem to give a fuck. The learning curve is steep. I guarentee you'll fucking hate this game when you start. There are still numerous bugs and balance issues and the community is still a steaming pile of shit. So there. No I can't recommend this.
Also ich spiele es ultra gerne. Ein paar Bugs hier und da aber welches Game ist schon bugfrei!? Das Lobbysystem ist naja nicht gerade dolle aber ich denke da wird sich noch was tun.

It can be fun. But you may have to yell at random people through your screen.

My previous thumbs down review: Devs ignore the community feedback and have no idea how the game is played in general.
极限逃生的感觉最棒了

crazy man go stab

generator go brrrrrrr
Was a fun game. Unplayable since the last patch.

ЭТО ПЕРВАЯ РПГ В МИРЕ В КОТОРОЙ ИМЕЕТ СМЫСЛ ВОРОВАТЬ ЗОЛОТУЮ ПОСУДУ.
Ибо она стоит как золотая, а не ые 5 септимов.
Казалось бы, что может быть проще чем обворовать подвал? Спускайся вниз, заглядывай в бочки, бери всё что плохо лежит, лезь в следующий подвал.
Однако, игра настолько кропотливо и с любовью сделана, что подземную комнату площадью 10х10 метров я изучал минут 15 реального времени. Обыскивал сундучки, обожрал запасы фруктов и овощей, распилил два бревна на стрелы, зажигал и задувал подсвечники, подобрал и выбросил вилы, сжёг сено, поговорил с крысой(! предварительно изучив скилл понимания животных).
Увидел потайную комнату. Выяснил что дверь в неё - за шкафом. Сдвинуть шкаф - не хватает силы. Сжечь стрелой огненной - у шкафа много прочности.
С досады начал жрать ветчину с вешалки.
За ветчиной обнаружилась кнопка. Кнопка отодвигает шкаф.
В комнате картины всякие стоимостью тысячи денег.
Пошёл на рынок, продал 3 картины торговцу овощей.
ЗДЕСЬ ЦЕНЯТ ИСКУССТВО!

Подскользнулась на собственной крови раз 50.
Украла у курицы табуретку.
Поговорила по душам с колодцем.
Сосватала кота.
Нашла пахучие трусы которые повышают обаяние.
Бык показал мне титры игры.
Проститутка рассказала мне сказку.
Впечатлений на год вперёд. 
10 из 10

За три золотых можно купить у кабана его же кишки. десятьиздесяти.

No recomendaré este juego hasta que lo arreglen. Simplemente el sistema de emparejado está roto, es practicamente imposible entrar a una partida sin tener que esperar media hora. Si solo hubiese que esperar no sería tanto problema, pero tienes que estar continuamente dandole a "listo", hay veces que parece entrar en una partida pero desde la pantalla de carga te devuelve al menú... El juego es bueno, pero solo por este problema lo hace practicamente injugable, sin contar otros errores ya dentro del juego, que a mi punto de vista son menores comparado con este. 
Por favor que arreglen esto.

Toxic community full of toxic people that the devs do nothing about. Avoid.

EDIT, 2022: My review stands. This game has actually gotten worse over time. I just played against a swf team. I went to go swing at one of them and the blade went *through* the player but didn't injure them. There was no lag. Make of that what you will.
Then theres the farmers, the balance issues, the fact randoms are at a distinct disadvantage and swf are at a distinct advantage, the cheaters, I can go on but why bother. Theres 100k other negative reviews that will tell you the same.

I'm going to remember Behaviour Interactive Inc., I'm going to avoid buying their games in the future.
If you're looking for something horror related, 4v1 and fun might I suggest the Evil Dead game thats coming out soon? That looks good. Go play that.
I think this game is cool! Would definitly recommend it :D

This is one of those games that is fun to play when the game is played as intended...

Unfortunately the community overwhelmingly decides to not do that.  They cite things like "its in the game so its fair" or "it was just you git gud" after proceding to perform 20 infinite loops followed by the next guy you chase doing the same.  

Killers are getting so F$#%ing pissed off that many of the lower level ones that don't have perks just end up camping like crazy because its the only way they get to do ANYTHING in some matches.  High level killers have a chance once they get some perks AND they play the right killer(Wraith is a noob trap don't level it guys)

But hey don't just think "salty killer" because geuss what I play both sides, and the only time I die as survivor is when I either mess up a jump or have an unlucky start...that's it.  Some games I feel so bad for killers I literally go find him just so he can chase me around while I drop pallets so he can get points.

So all in all great game with a few bugs that are being to heavily exploited by the survivor community resulting in less killers playing therefore less matches overall due to killer being the game host.

I'd say 5/10 atm for experience but like 9/10 for potential fun factor.  Once devs fix the know issues the game will be much better.

Da in vielen Bewertungen die Nachfolgenden Punkte zu Genüge erläutert wurden hier die Kurzform warum ich dieses Spiel absolut nicht empfehlen kann:

-Ein Spiel gemeinsam mit Freunden (Überlebe mit Freunden) zu finden ist nahezu unmöglich. Zu viert ist es uns zum Beispiel noch nicht einmal gelungen

-Lagger und vermeintliche Hacker (teleporting, wallhacks usw) wohin man nur schaut

Ansonsten hat das Spielprinzip bis jetzt schon recht Spaß bereitet wird aber durch die obigen Punkte vollkommen zunichte gemacht. Sollten die Programmierer also irgendwann mal auf die Idee kommen vernünftige Server und eine brauchbare Spielsuche zu implementieren wäre das eventuell die Rettung!!

I gave thi a thumbs up...BUT, before you buy I think you should read this:

- The Matchmaking system/ Lobby searcher is broken... some times it can take up to 10 min just to find a match, and you have to restart the lobby search vry often due to it stops searching.

- People are not team players and this is a very team based game...
- Lots of bugs.
- Some perks are very OP and the killers will camp the hooks, witch kinda ruins the fun a lot

HOWEVER..... This game is super fun. It gets your heart pumping as the killer walks right by you, or you manadges to escape a long chase.
You get a very rewarding feeling when escaping and winning the match, and when matched with good teammates you will love the game.

I thought this game would become very repedative as the goal is the same all the time. However, when u meet diffrent killers, with diffrent playing styles and perks and skill level, it becomes a VERY diffrent experience each game.

This game has MASSIVE potential
8/10 FIX the search engiene and I will give it 9/10

Super Spiel das mir nach wochen immernoch einen halben Herzinfakt beschert wenn es ernst wird. Kann es nur weiter empfehlen auch wenn es noch kleinere Macken hat. Man sollte sich von anfänglichen Schwierigkeiten nicht entmutigen lassen, da man vor allem als Killer Probleme haben kann überhaupt einen Survivor zu finden. Wenn ihr dann doch einen finden solltet macht am besten nicht den fehler am Hacken zu Campen, dies führt leider oftmals zu einem wahren Shitstorm. Ansonsten alles Top.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g4t5_PlG0TY Обожаю эту игру, а чтобы вы поняли как, оставлю ссылочку на свой летсплей:3

Really good game. Has some issues but not deal breakers for the average gamer. Do you cry when it rains outside? Is your time of the month not limited to a week, but every day? Then this is not the game for you. However, if you enjoy a cat and mouse type game, that's a bit different than most games out there, then you'll enjoy this game. The matchmaking can take a while sometimes, but I always switch to killer and I'm cooking with gas in no time. For $20, you'll get a lot of action, and you'll be "hooked" before you know it.
Its my favorite game. BUT, the matchmaking is terrible. We cant found a game if we are 2-3-4 or maybe found one game in 10 minutes. please fix that !! :'(
Never played a game with such horrible matchmaking, this is the first time i've ever felt the need to write a review but it takes so long to find a match with friends. Horrible, Horrible service.

This game is no where near 21$ it sucks so fucking much. I've played enough to notice that everything about the killers is super unbalanced until you get a really bad one with no perks... It takes forever to get generators done and Jake bobs sabateur perk is pure ass. The red haired chick is shit without her speed perk. Killers can hit through trees and walls and have perks that allow them to find survivors easily. This game is unbalance and should be fixed and if you dont want to fix it bring the price down cause its not worth 21$ its worth something around the 5-10$ price range.

крутая игруха наводящая страх на игроков )) 5 из 5

*Original Review*

I have played this game a ton.  The concept is fun enough, but there are some big outstanding issues.  Trying to find a match is a nightmare.  We've waited more than 20 minutes before giving up.  If this was an early access title, most of the problems could be forgiven.  But it isn't.  Friday the 13th: The Game, and Last Year is just a few months away and look a bit more promising.

While I have definitely got my money's worth, but until some of the big bugs are fixed, I would recommend buying this on sale.


Years of love and polish have made this game amazing.  Definitely buy now!
This game is amzaing when you find a lobby which isnt that hard or bad.

Überlebende zu jagen und töten. Klar gibt es noch bugs hier und da und
auch ist das Lobbysystem teils noch mangelhaft, vor allem wenn man mit Freunden spielt
und ne halbe ewigkeit auf eine Lobby warten muss, aber es macht wirklich Spaß.

während eines laufenden spiels mit dem eigenen Team komunizieren zu können.

Trotz allem macht es Spaß und wie man schon an updates und patches gesehen hat, wird daran gearbeitet das Spiel zu verbessern.

Gayet Güzel arkadaşlarla gülmeli korkmalı korku oyunu.Arkadaşlarınızla birlikte bir oyunda katil olabilirsiniz yada hayatta kalmaya çalışanlardan biri olabilirsiniz.Oyunun artı ve eksilerine gelinecek olursa:

Artılar:
+Haritalar güzel.Yeni bir oyun olmasına rağmen çeşitler gayet iyi.
+Hayatta Kalanlar ve Katiller gayet dengeli.Kesin kazanan bir taraf yok ki buda oyunun en güzel kısmı.
+Level sistemi güzel.Para basıp geçemiyorsun.Daha fazla yetenek puanı kazanmak için daha cesaretli olman gerekiyor(Yaratığın koynunda bir başkasını kurtarmak gibi).

Eksiler:
-Oyun Henüz Yeni olduğundan optimizasyon sorunları var.Bu kadar az yer kaplayan bir oyuna göre ultrada 30 fps çekmesi garip.
-Tek oynamak sıkar.En az 2 kişi olmak dışında oyun oynanmaz.
-Katil olup bir arkadaşla birlikte duo queue(Çifte sıra)girmek yok.Oda oda dolaşıp arkadaşınla birlikte Şu diyaloğu defalarca yaşaman gerekiyor:
A:Bir odaya girdim.Baksana orada mıyım?
B:Yok kanka çık gel.Bak bir kişilik yer kaldı acele et.
A:Bir odaya daha girdim orada mıyım?
B:Hayır ama başkası girdim dur çıkıyorum tekrar kurucam.
-Her Saat başı bir bug bulunduğundan sabah akşam yamalanıyor.Oyun yeni tabi pek de takmamak lazım.

Kısa Geçersek,Oyun zevkli,arkadaş varsa oyna,yoksa oynama!

（评论区接龙大成功！接龙界的荣耀!!！）
这是一个只有少数人才知道的真实恐怖故事。
有那么4位来自 HK 的大学毕业生。众所周知HK有着 坠吼 的新闻专业。毕业后他们都励志成为一个能报道大新闻的 HK 记者。
一次他们得知某个著名的 老者 退休后，隐居在一个大庄园。他们心想，如果能采访到这位有着几亿粉丝 老者 。那该是多么的光荣啊！于是他们致电 老者 希望能采伐他的退休后生活。
不过这位 老者 为人低调，喜欢闷声发大财。拒绝了他们采访。
四人很是失望。他们觉得作为一个合格的 HK记者 不能让这个报道 大新闻 的机会溜走了。采访不到 老者 他们决定晚上偷偷潜入去偷拍些 老者 的生活照。
老者 身边一直有四人照料他的起居。一个带着陷阱驱赶附件危险动物的猎人。一个带着电锯修剪杂草和花园的园艺师傅。一个照看老者健康的护士。还有一个据说是会隐身的贴身保镖。
据都市传说 这四人经常在庄园某处的地下室进行不为人知的古老仪式，更有传言这些仪式是 老者 长寿的秘密。
作为 HK记者 他们觉得除了老者的生活状况，也很有必要验证下这个都市传说。
一个月黑风高，还起着雾的夜晚，四位 HK记者 潜入了 老者 的庄园。整个庄园弥漫着血腥味，老者的四位保镖夜间也还在巡逻。
爆炸头的记者不小心踩到了一个隐藏在草丛中的捕兽夹，撕心裂肺的疼痛让他大声的叫了出来。这一声大喊惊动了老者的保镖们。
同伴们还在专心帮他脱离夹子，没意识到已经被老者的保镖包围了。作为HK记者，跑步是他们强项，他们有自信跑的比谁都快，可是怎么能跑得过这些身经百战的保镖呢？
四人被两刀砍倒在地，他们大喊“饶了我们，我们只是想拍些照片，报道点新闻”
保镖四人对记者的大喊不予理睬，只是冷笑着把他们扛在肩上，向着地下室走去。
在这个满地是血的地下室有四个不知道用途的钩子。
记者四人被挂在了钩子上，伴随着疼痛他们能明显的感受到了自己的寿命-1s，-1s不停的在减少。
四人恍然大悟，意识到了所谓的仪式和 老者 长寿的秘密到底是什么。
可惜已经太晚了，一切都太晚了。
四人能明显的感受到自己的生命马上就要耗尽，无法把这一切都都报道出去了。。。 。。。

เป็นเกมสยองขวัญ ที่รุ้สึกถึงความตื่นเต้นมากๆตลอดเวลาที่เล่น หากเล่นเป็นฝ่ายผู้รอดชีวิต บรรยากาศทำออกมาได้ตื่นเต้นมากและกดดันซึ่งเป็นข้อดีของเกมสยองขวัญที่ควรมี เราไม่สามารถรู้ได้ว่าฆาตกรหรือผีอยู่ไหน หากฆาตรกรหรือผียังเข้ามาไม่ถึงระยะ

ตัวเกมให้เราหาทางออกจากสถานที่นึงโดย ทุกๆด่าน เราจะต้อง ซ่อมเครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า หรือหากเหลือรอดแค่2 คน สามารถ หาทางออกลัดได้ ความรุ้สึกในเกม เหมือนเราเป็นตัวละครในบทหนังสยองขวัญเรื่องๆนึงจริงๆ ผู้ที่คิดว่าจะรอดชีวิตอาจตายได้ และผู้ที่ดูไม่รอดกลับรอด คุณอาจตายได้ทุกเมื่อในเกมนี้แม้คุณจะไม่ประมาท และตายได้มากขึ้นหากคุณประมาท 
 ฝ่ายฆาตรกรหรือผี หากประมาทก็สามารถแพ้ได้เช่นกัน หากเราอยากตื่นเต้นและเข้าถึงบรรยากาศของเกมได้สูงที่สุดควรเล่นเป็นฝ่ายผู้รอดชีวิตครับ 

โดยรวมสนุกมากครับ ได้บรรยากาศของความกดดัน ความตื่นเต้น และลุ้นจริงๆ

10/10 
Would be man's best friend again.

[h1] Постараюсь изложиться кратко. [/h1]

Играть я начал в момент выхода игры,это был глоток свежего воздуха в плане командных игр для меня,была атмосфера,отличные обновления,но в какой-то момент произошёл поворот не туда и игра начала затухать.Да,сейчас есть вполне неплохой онлайн,и люди продолжают играть,апать 1-ый ранг и учить различные фейки,360 и т.д; Но сейчас 1-ый ранг и прочие заслуги не являются показателем,пропало желание поднимать его снова и снова. Думаю,многим старичкам игра наскучила,ведь в ней уже нечего ловить,но новичкам будет интересно залететь в неё и провести приятно время(Но будьте готовы к приседающим стакам и подобным токсикам).

Мне больше нечего сказать про DBD,просто решил оставить своё скудное мнение.В любом случае,эта игра для меня значила многое и я был ею одержим,вот и решил оставить небольшой след своим обзором.Игра ни в коем случае не стала полнейшим говном,это не так,но опять же повторюсь,большей части старых игроков уже не будет по душе играть в неё.
(Это моё мнение,и ваше право,соглашаться с ним или нет)

The match making if awful, rank 20 survivors against rank 1 assassin. I do think that´s a big deal. Also it´s hard to find a match when playing with friends. Not fair that if the assassin leaves the match you get only the points you´ve done so far. People still get kicked out when the game is starting so you end up with 3 survivors and a good ranked assassin. The idea of the game if really good, but fixing the match making would make it so much more enjoyable.

Game started out weak for me.

However, as I was forced to play more and more by my friends lol. This game is a hell of a blast to play.

The feeling of escaping and escaping the killer's grasp as a survivor is so amusing and addicting.
The idea of killing your friends or just killing people as a unstoppable, intimidating force to be reckoned with is just a pleasure.
The idea of the bloodweb and making your loadouts is good and interesting.
Matchmaking now feels a lot quicker. Community is bigger now.


Now just add more free DLCs and give us a museum map or something.
And make it so that killers could just invite friends and start a public lobby.

Лучшая игра!)

Add 02.19.2019
Лучшая игра, чтоб сгореть от хитов через окно из-за пинга, из-за хитов сквозь паллету по той же причине, из-за выход прям в лицо маньяку (после чего из игры), из-за BBQ, руина, и нюрс колла в каждой катке. В общем, лучшая игра!)

Played 1 match in 20 minute. The match lasted 3 min before I got hooked. All of the rest of the time was spent waiting to join lobby. I can't wait for version 3.0.1 when hopefully the have all the bugs worked out and I can actually play the game instead of looking at the lobby.

The game has so many problems. The killer has a very long reach, glitches are an every game occurence, and cheaters are frequent. Even without cheaters in the game the killers can hit you through trees and through windows. The connection or the game itself makes it impossible to perform actions and delays everything making it that much longer to escape/help and that much shorter until the killer finds you.

This is an updated review starting on May 15 2017:
   as time pass by i havent touch the games in months and now i have started to give a game a second chance.
   since i have started to try it agian i have to give a credit to the dev (for now) as they promise to be working out the game and blancing out charaters which is giving me hope for this game, the same hope i had when this games was first annouced.
   so far the new update seems to give hope and the im going to say this now and say it, im really enjoying it.
   im not going to put my full thoughts in it since its still in work so until then im going to leave it as a game to pick up if you need a new game, so im saying this, im having hope if the dev keeps up with there words, the more they keep their words and making it fun and fair, the more ill start to enjoy this game.

Melhor jogo, mecânica diferenciada. Você precisa usar alem da visão, muito a audição e ouvir os sobreviventes respirando, ou escutar o coração do assassino quando ele está por perto. Um jogo de terror e suspense que realmente assusta, não é a toa que está no ranking de viewers na twitch. Recomendo!

Just bought this game waiting for Friday the 13Th to come out.  I like the game when I can actually play it, and would like to give some feedback.  "Game is broken"  I'm a noob just bought it...but wow!!!!  Matchmaking is the worst I've seen in years.  It takes me 20 minutes or more at times to finaly get into a game...WTF....unacceptable in todays age.  Thats my oververall gripe against this game.  

I have other issues with this game but don't think those matter right now....If you can actually get into a game without rage quiting the lobby for failed connects "I Cheers you"!!

At first it was some bullshit about steam login not working. So like any person, I left this and started playing other games that actually worked and connected. Months go by and a DLC later, still this game has connection issues. Now no, no game will be completely free of bugs and problems, however, when it's this far down the road and now it's telling me failed to connect to lobby. Alternately, it looks like it joined a lobby and then takes you back to join a lobby, then fails ago. Don't waste your limited time or money on this game. I wanted to get back into it and no, it's still shit. At this point I'd rather play No Mans Sky for a few weeks then try to get it refunded because at least that game will work.

I main killer so this doesn't affect me as much as others but I think I owe it to the community to write a bad review. Once this is fixed the review will be changed. I know this has been said one million times already but this is a serious issue. They released DLC (to give them credit it is free) before fixing the que. If you only want to play as killer then definetley worth buying. The que should be fixed soon although until then I wouldn't touch it.

I absolutely love this game. The way it looks, the way it plays, the way it sounds, everything from the menu to the noises you make when doing some, feels and is unique.
This game is fun to play to randoms and friends alike.
My only  major concern with this game is the fuc king matchmaking.
I want someone to find this out, but my guess (if you only play matchmaking) is that 60% of your play time is just trying to join a game. 
And when you do join a game you must pray that your teammates arent retarded and the killer isnt a camping douche
but when you do find that game
it is glorious and beautiful
